word_mean: 氧化-还原：一种化学反应，可使电子从受到氧化的物质上脱离(氧化)，并转移到被还原的原子上(还原)

sentence.Network_en: By oxidation - reduction reaction, copper is cemented into the iron.
sentence.Network_cn: 经氧化 ― 还原反应, 铜渗入铁中.

sentence.Network_en: Sometimes oxidation - reduction electrodes are used as internal indicators.
sentence.Network_cn: 氧化还原电极有时用作内显示器.

sentence.Network_en: Each electrode is impregnated with a catalyst to speed the oxidation reduction or half reaction.
sentence.Network_cn: 每个电极掺入催化剂,以加重电池半氧化或还原反应.
